AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Yusif Ahmed Rufied: defendant charged with unlawfully transporting illegal aliens, claimed to be a driver in training
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruce Henderson: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) Agent and witness, testified against Defendant, described terrain and events related to the smuggling case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Martin Adaboh: Codefendant of Yusif Ahmed Rufied, from Ghana, Africa, lives in Quebec, Montreal, Canada, involved in smuggling aliens, changed mind about speaking with ICE agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Claudia: woman met by Codefendant at the Monterrey Inn, approached Codefendant to smuggle aliens, present during alien loading
